data.title: Hoot Gibson
data.text:
AKA Edmund Richard Gibson

Born: 6-Aug-1892

Birthplace: Tekamah, NE

Died: 23-Aug-1962

Location of death: Woodland Hills, CA

Cause of death: unspecified

Remains: Buried, Inglewood Park Cemetery, Inglewood, CA

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Cowboy star of the 20s and 30s

Wife: Rose August Wenger (m. 1913, div. 1920)

Wife: Helen Gibson (m. 1922, div. 1930, one daughter)

Daughter: Lois (b. 1923)

Wife: Sally Eilers (m. 27-Jun-1930, div. 24-Sep-1933)

Wife: Dorothy Dunstan (m. 3-Jul-1942, until his death)

Hollywood Walk of Fame 1777 Vine St.

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

The Horse Soldiers (12-Jun-1959) · Brown

The Marshal's Daughter (26-Jun-1953)

The Utah Kid (26-Aug-1944) · Marshal Higgins

Arizona Whirlwind (21-Feb-1944)

Death Valley Rangers (3-Dec-1943)

The Painted Stallion (5-Jun-1937)

The Last Outlaw (14-Jun-1936)

The Gay Buckaroo (17-Jan-1932)

Wild Horse (2-Aug-1931)

Straight Shooting (27-Aug-1917)
